thread.title: New Yoga Studio to Open in Sturgeon Bay
thread.title_full: New Yoga Studio to Open in Sturgeon Bay

title: New Yoga Studio to Open in Sturgeon Bay
text:
The Yoga Womb, located at 58 W. Maple Ave. in Sturgeon Bay, will open Oct. 1.
A grand opening event will take place that day, 4-7 pm. Attendees can learn about yoga and the studio, meet instructors and facilitators, try some poses, enjoy light refreshments, participate in a dance party, and enter to win an eight-week yoga class. The public can also try out classes during the studio’s Five Days of Free Yoga Oct. 1-5.
The new studio and wellness center will offer beginner, intermediate and advanced yoga classes, as well as other experiences to facilitate mental, physical and spiritual growth. Current class offerings include traditional hatha, vinyasa, yen, yin, restorative, somatics, group coaching and yoga for kids, with more to come.
Regular classes will commence Oct. 7. Classes run in 8-week sessions. Most also have drop-ins available. The full schedule and details will be posted at theyogawomb.org.
“My hope is that the studio becomes a place where everybody, especially those who need it most, can explore their healing and personal growth journey through a multitude of experiences in a safe, supportive environment,” founder Brooke Ulrich said.
Follow The Yoga Womb on Facebook or Instagram for more information coming soon.
